content: {"name": "Heavens Gateway Ministries", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Preregistration required on website: https://www.hgwministries.com/register-now", "email": "", "url": "https://www.hgwministries.com/register-now", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "9517 South Main Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Jonesboro", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30236", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.4951988, "longitude": -84.3412903}, "phones": [{"number": "(678) 545-4785", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "20:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Pre-registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors and people with disabilities"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Emergency food available on an as-needed basis."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration on website required"}]}
